Package lib

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageHandling
    This Interface is to define the basic API for a raft node.
    MessagingLayer  
    RemoteControllerIntf
    This Interface is to define the remote callback functions for the raft node.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplyMsg  
    Controller
    Controller - This class is the implementation of the MessageLayer, which is to simulate an underlayer unreliable network, all the message from each rafe peer will be processed by this network, and the network decide whether there is delay or drop the message packets.
    GetStateReply
    GetStateReply - This is a serializable packet wrapper for the getState method of transportLayer.
    Message
    Message - This class is the Wrapper class of the Raft protocol, with a payload to contain whatever byte data.
    RemoteController
    This class is the implementation of the RemoteControllerIntf.
    RequestVoteArgs
    This class is a wrapper for packing all the arguments that you might use in the RequestVote call, and should be serializable to fill in the payload of Message to be sent.
    RequestVoteReply
    This class is a wrapper for packing all the result information that you might use in your own implementation of the RequestVote call, and also should be serializable to return by remote function call.
    StartReply  
    TransportLib
    This class is for a raft node to communicate with other nodes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MessageType
    This enum is for distinguishing different message type you might send, for example you may need a unique type for each remote function call.
